Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Dermaseptin DPh-1  (DShypo 01; Dermaseptin-H3, Dermaseptin H3, DRS-H3, Dermaseptin-H12, Dermaseptin H12, DRS-H12, Drs H12; XXA, Ala-rich; natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Brazilian tree frog,Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis, South America

Literature Information.Literature: C-terminal NH2.Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC 43300 MRSA (MIC 26.5 uM) and P. aeruginosa wt MR (MIC 6.6 uM). Also active against L. amazonensis (parasite).  Updated 7/2021.
